name: SITA Lab
description: SITA APIs provide developers in the air transportation industry access to data and processes to expedite innovation for developing solutions.  Our Boarding Pass API provides airlines with complete flexibility in the creation, branding and distribution of IATA and TSA compliant mobile boarding passes.  Other commercial-grade APIs provide access to real-time baggage tracking information and general purpose airport data.  SITA will expose more APIs over time.
